/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings painted in vibrant hues of red and green, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling city life. Trees dot the sidewalk, providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
